00006 FilesystemNode* Filesystem::evaluateChild(Folder* Parent, const char* targetNode)
00007 {
00008     const char* firstSlash = strchr( targetNode , '/');
00009 
00010     if (firstSlash == 0)
00011     {
00012         //Pass it to the folder internal search
00013         return Parent->searchForChild( targetNode );
00014     }
00015     else
00016     {
00017         size_t entryLength = firstSlash - targetNode;
00018 
00019         FilesystemNode* childNode = Parent->searchForChild( targetNode , entryLength);
00020 
00021         if (childNode != 0)
00022         {
00023 
00024             if (childNode->getType() != folderId)
00025             {
00026 
00027                 //Not a folder, can't be searched
00028                 return 0;
00029 
00030             }
00031             else
00032             {
00033 
00034                 Folder* childFolder = static_cast<Folder*>(childNode);
00035                 return Filesystem::evaluateChild(childFolder, firstSlash + 1);
00036 
00037             }
00038         }
00039         else
00040         {
00041             return 0;
00042         }
00043 
00044     }
00045 }

00047 FilesystemNode* Filesystem::search(const char* TargetFile) {
00048     return Filesystem::evaluateChild( Filesystem::getRoot(), TargetFile );
00049 }

00051 DataInputStream* Filesystem::getFileInputStream(const char* targetFile) {
00052 
00053     //Find the node
00054     FilesystemNode* node = Filesystem::search(targetFile);
00055 
00056     //If it failed return null
00057     if (!node) {
00058 
00059         return 0;
00060     }
00061 
00062     //Check the file type
00063     if (node->getType() != fileId) {
00064         return 0;
00065     }
00066 
00067     //Convert it to a file
00068     File* toFileNode = static_cast<File*>(node);
00069 
00070     return toFileNode->createInputStream();
00071 }

00095 static Folder* g_filesystemRoot = 0;

00097 Folder* Filesystem::getRoot()
00098 {
00099     if (g_filesystemRoot == 0)
00100     {
00101         g_filesystemRoot = new LocalFolder("Root", "./");
00102         g_filesystemRoot->refresh();
00103     }
00104 
00105     return g_filesystemRoot;
00106 }
